roleset.name: bring forth, generate
roleset.note: SIRE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls engender-27. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sire.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: What hope lay in the nephews , she asked the intensifying light out there , with one married to a barren woman and [the other]-1 divorced, [*]-1 having sired two girl children , with noneto bear on the Packard name ? ?
